member.name: P:Flame.Syntax.ITypeSyntax.IsVariable
member.summary: Gets if this type syntax represents a type that matches the type of the expression it's assigned to.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.SyntaxExtensions.GetCallerExpression(Flame.Syntax.ITypeMemberAccessSyntax,Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxState)
member.summary: Gets an expression for the syntax that accesses the member. Returns null if the member is accessed statically.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.ITypeMemberAccessSyntax.GetCallerVariable(Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxState)
member.summary: Gets a variable for the syntax that accesses the member. Returns null if the member is accessed statically.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.ITypeMemberAccessSyntax.GetAccessedMembers(Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxState)
member.summary: Gets all type members that fit the syntax's description.

member.name: P:Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxAssembly.RootNamespace
member.summary: Gets the nameless root namespace of the assembly.
